pages.page:
BS INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY
AREA IX: LABORATORIES
PARAMETER C:
MAINTENANCE
SYSTEM — INPUTS AND
PROCESSES
S.1. A laboratory technician/assistant
is available for the proper upkeep
of the laboratories.
Cavite State University- Trece Martires City Campus
The computer laboratory inn-charge is available for the proper upkeep of the laboratory

The IT student body, League of Information Technology Leaders, always conduct a semestral clean
and repair drive of computer laboratory. Activities are
computer preventive maintenance, reformatting, re- networking, repainting computer tables and delivering
necessary repair procedures.

The campus has on-the-job trainees from Certificate in Computer Technician and BS Information Technology
Students from senior high school ands colleges. These
OJTs keep and maintain computer laboratory in a daily basis in duration of the required time they should
rendered.

AREA IX: LABORATORIES
PARAMETER C:
MAINTENANCE
SYSTEM — INPUTS AND
PROCESSES
S.2. The institution has a Maintenance
and Repair Department/Unit
manned by skilled personnel who
provides service on direct call.
S.2.1. Inventory of
equipment and supplies;
Cavite State University- Trece Martires City Campus

BS INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY
AREA IX: LABORATORIES
PARAMETER C:
MAINTENANCE
IMPLEMENTATION
I.4. The laboratory equipment and
instruments are in good
condition and are periodically
calibrated.
Cavite State University- Trece Martires City Campus
Multitester used for prototyping were calibrated regularly

Printers inside computer laboratory were regularly
maintain, realign print head, check nozzle, head cleaning and
ink flushing.

Cavite State University- Trece Martires City Campus

CvSU Trece Martires City Campus Existing Computer
Laboratory with 1 teacher’s desktop computer, 35 networked desktop computers, 2 sets of A4 continuous ink 3-in-1 printers and 1 set of A3 printer. All units are functional.

A B
C
CvSU Trece Martires City Campus Existing Computer Laboratory with 36 Computer Units and 3 Printers. Printers specification are: A) Epson 415 Continuous 3-in1 printer with scanner and photocopier and Wifi enabled; B) Epson 415 Continuous 3-in1 printer with scanner and photocopier and Wifi enabled; C) Epxon L3100 Continuous A4 printer.
